Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLButtonTabView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----ec.ifc.app.ECTabView
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLButtonTabView
public class SLButtonTabView
extends ECTabView
ECTabView subclass that applies the stone-texture look using SLButtonTabItems. This tab view looks right when it just overlaps a lowered SLBezelBorder (typically on a ContainerView)
See Also:
SLButtonTabItem, SLLayeredTabView

SLButtonTabView()
Constructs an SLButtonTabView object with bounds 0,0,0,0

Constructs an SLButtonTabView object with the given bounds

Constructs an SLButtonTabView object with the given bounds
